title: Design Strategies to Enhance Blended Learning Effectiveness

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of intermediate-level courses in related fields or equivalent experience
context.additional_context: Flexible Learning Environment for Working Professionals, Utilizing BYOD for Personal Device Integration

learning_goals: Learners can explain technology quality (content accessibility, user-friendliness) and online tool utilization strategies when designing blended learning
Learners can apply self-directed learning attitudes and self-regulation strategies to project execution
Learners develop strategies to improve learning satisfaction by over 30% based on online-face-to-face integrated support systems
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
